headline.main: 600 AXIS CAPTIVES SEIZED AT BARDIA; South Africans' Attack on Isolated Garrison Also Nets Fortified Posts R.A.F. KEEPS UP ASSAULT Pounds Foe's Tanks Around Agedabia and Hammers Points in Tripolitania

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, Jan. 1 (AP) -- Rearguard units of the British Eighth Army, concerned lest an Axis "Tobruk" develop on the flank of Britain's desert advance, have struck hard at the well-fortified Italian-German forces isolated in the Bardia-Halfaya region of Eastern Libya.
abstract: Brit rearguard units attack Axis forces, Bardia-Halfaya area
